style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="370" y="440" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="11" value="<span style="font-size: 13px;">SecretBindings</span><div><span style="font-size: 13px;">(Credentials</span><span style="font-size: 13px; background-color: initial;">Bindings)</span></div>" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;strokeColor=#666666;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="600" y="180" width="140" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="12" value="<span <mxPoint x="397" y="240" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="16" value="<font style="font-size: 12px;">requests appropriate Secret Binding</font>" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=bottom;resizable=0;points=[];labelBackgroundColor=none;" parent="15" vertex="1" connectable="0"> <mxGeometry x="0.3922" relative="1" as="geometry"> style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontSize=12;fillColor=#0a6ec7;strokeColor=#0a6ec7;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="327" y="214" width="30" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
